title: Partly Cloudy With An 80% Chance of Murder
description: This novel begins at the very start of Michael J Rock's career as a Homicide Detective in the NYPD, chasing killers through the actual streets of New York City, searching for clues in actual locations and uncovers the deeds of some of the most diabolical villains to ever walk among us. Plus, he shares some of his favorite culinary recipes with you as he feeds himself and the young child he has taken in from the streets to save her from danger, and in the process, she saves him as well. If you enjoyed the Michael J. Rock, PI series but wondered where he got started then wonder no more. Just open the book and dive right in!
author: Michael G. Edwards
